entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Chapleau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:17 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.3Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chapleau Airport 7:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.3°C
Pressure: 101.6 kPa
Visibility: 24 km
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.9°C
Wind: ENE 26 km/h gust 39 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of ice pellets or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and freezing rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain this morning then to freezing rain and a few flurries this afternoon. Risk of a thunderstorm. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 16 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of freezing rain or rain. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain and a few flurries ending late this evening then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers late this evening and overnight then 60 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this evening. Temperature rising to 7 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
